title: Ads are coming to ChatGPT. News publishers with OpenAI deals won’t see a dime.
description: Ads are officially coming to ChatGPT. A new article from The Information confirms that OpenAI has already pitched placements in ChatGPT to dozens of advertisers. The report comes on the heels of an announcement last week from the company, which said ChatGPT ads would start rolling out for some users in the U.S. imminently. For...
